articles.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp says "anyone not in the right shape" to produce an atmosphere for Saturday's top-of-the-table match against Arsenal should "give their ticket somebody else".
articles.title: 'If you're not in right shape, give away your ticket' – Klopp

articles.description: In 2014, Germany unleashed the power of numbers to help them to the World Cup title. Now, even the smallest teams have access to open-source data to arm them on the biggest stage.
articles.title: How World Cup underdogs thrived on data revolution

articles.description: Liverpool cruise into the EFL Cup semi-finals with a dominant performance against West Ham at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool thrash West Ham to reach EFL Cup semis

articles.description: Bayern Munich's Harry Kane plans to send his English friends a photo from the beach as he prepares for his first proper winter break.
articles.title: 'I'll text beach pictures' - Kane 'can't wait' for winter break

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe marks his 25th birthday with two goals as Paris St-Germain beat Metz - with his 16-year-old brother Ethan making his debut late on.
articles.title: Mbappe scores on birthday as brother makes debut

articles.description: Rangers beat 10-man St Johnstone to move two points behind Scottish Premiership leaders Celtic.
articles.title: Rangers beat St Johnstone to reduce Celtic's lead

articles.description: Sixteen year-old Luke Littler makes it through to the second round of the 2024 PDC World Darts Championship as former champion Peter Wright is knocked out.
articles.title: PDC World Championship 2024: Peter Wright beaten but Luke Littler, 16, wins on debut

articles.description: Real Madrid could move for Manchester United defender Raphael Varane, Arsenal lead race for Ivan Toney, Everton want £100m for Jarrad Branthwaite, plus more.
articles.title: Real Madrid interested in Man Utd's Varane - Thursday's gossip

articles.description: Harry Kane stays on course to break the record for Bundesliga goals in a season with his 21st strike as Bayern Munich beat Wolfsburg.
articles.title: Kane scores to continue record-breaking Bayern run

articles.description: Ben Stokes and Jofra Archer will have places kept open for them in the England team for the 2024 T20 World Cup, says coach Matthew Mott.
articles.title: England keep T20 World Cup places open for Stokes & Archer
